post.body: right back atcha, babe!
My massage therapist is dumping me cuz I'm not preggers. Is it totally wrong that might actually be a valid reason to get with child?
Blizzard is starting too early! Need it to cancel work Friday- listen up, Mother Nature!!!
Maybe I do have too many clothes. Gasp! Forgot about these formerly favorite jeans.
Does cheese and crackers and grapefruit Blue Sky qualify as a healthy breakfast?
Where's my freezing rain? I need an excuse to not go to work. Or, alternately, delivery donut and coffee service.
Heat working again! Still snuggled up in cozy duds. Warm at last!
Warmed up to a balmy 38 degrees- where's my bikini?
Cold weather making me want comfort food- mac-n-cheese, steak, red wine!
Not sure if I'd rather be warm at work or cold at home
Heater people can't come look at the problem til tomorrow. Naturally.
WTF!!! Our heat decides to quit NOW?!?
Well this just sucks
Whiskey delivery service in effect!
It was a truly magnifique day today- sunshiney, blue skies, and sparkling ice crystals! Tonight is gonna get cold- I recommend cuddling.
http://twitpic.com/tcwe - Delayed start time! Good wife points by doing AM dog walk. Gorgeousness! But COLD!
11 degrees?? Snuggles back into bed, hits snooze... Again
a brisk invigorating walk, a hot spiked coffee, Dexter finale- rather satisfying for a Monday eve
I have had the worst interviews today! Why must people be dumbasses and why must they give me grief when I am trying to help them!
Reward for showing up to work on a snow day? Extra work. Let no good deed go unpunished!
Kombucha and snowfall!
We're fucking fabulous. It's absurd, really.
Guest reports, "It's like I died and went to heaven on New Year's Eve."
I declare this party started!
Stupid pedi man is MIA. I am sweating the small stuff. Repeats compliment received earlier to self..."Self, you are winningly divalicious!"
Pedicure in .5. Need me some twinkletoes, as I'll be getting down under the Glitterball this eve! Cuz that's the way I roll.
You better lose yourself in the music, the moment, you own it, you better never let it go.
Would like to roundhouse kick this workday and get on to the Glitterama Gala! Countdown: T-minus 1 hour til liftoff.
Party now, worry later. Kick off heels to get down. If you're gonna drop your panties, drop 'em to the floor. "It's the Hotskateers Way!"
Torn between yawning cuz I couldn't sleep last night and wriggling with excitement. Tonight we're gonna party like it's 1999- plus 9!
Copious wine?Check. Discoball? Check. Hotskateers?Check.There's a fair to middling chance tonight will turn out to be the best party of '09!
http://twitpic.com/y5z1 - Glitterama!
NYE gala tomorrow and party planning is in full effect!
I will literally brawl with anyone who alleges "Down Under" is not a kick-ass song. &, unlike most people, I even know what literally means.
GuiltyTweet: I am reading the final Twilight series book and I listened to Eminem on my way to work. I am an enigmatic sort.
Cooks is vile, disgusting stuff and should never, ever be imbibed- even in punch or mimosas. I'm not a champagne snob per se, but c'mon ppl!
If, say, I was involved in broken snow globe in PM and broken Xmas light in AM, that wouldn't be 14 years of bad luck, right? Just klutzy?
Note to self: 3 friends, drinking the better part of 2 bottles of wine, then moving heavy furniture= doomed to result in broken snow globe
Twitter: modern haiku (a Nick co-tweet)
